programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Director Tony Scott puts golden boys Robert Redford and Brad Pitt through their paces in this fast-paced espionage thriller. Redford plays a CIA operative who spends his final day at the agency trying to coordinate the rescue of his protégé (Pitt), who's being held in a Chinese prison---and hung out to dry by his superiors. Catherine McCormack, Marianne Jean-Baptiste.

programme.title: Bright Young Things
programme.desc: A superb cast including Jim Broadbent, Peter O'Toole, Dan Aykroyd and Stockard Channing brings this witty adaptation of Evelyn Waugh's novel to life. Stephen Campbell Moore plays an aspiring novelist seduced by hedonistic British society in the 1930s. Emily Mortimer, James McAvoy, Michael Sheen, David Tennant.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Sparks fly in this riveting thriller about a Secret Service agent investigating his mentor, who is suspected of plotting to assassinate the president while having an affair with the First Lady. Adapted from the novel by Gerald Petievich, who served in the U.S. Army Intelligence Corps and worked at the Treasury Department.

programme.title: Cap
programme.desc: A teenager learns the price of being cool when he dons a status symbol in his high school.

programme.title: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
programme.desc: A 17-year-old girl travels from a rural Pennsylvania town to New York City with her cousin to get an abortion (since a local abortion would require her parent's permission). Bureaucratic hurdles force both teenagers to remain in the city for far longer than they expected.

programme.title: All Is Lost
programme.desc: A solitary mariner struggles to survive in the Indian Ocean as his damaged sailboat begins to sink and his radio equipment fails. Later, he attempts to locate a shipping route in hopes of being rescued in this masterful tale of man versus nature.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Paul Walker puts the pedal to the metal in this high-octane sequel to 2001's \"The Fast and the Furious.\" Walker returns as Brian O'Conner, a cop skilled at street racing. This time out, he goes undercover in Miami to take down a drug magnate. The result: relentless action, kinetic street racing and gravity-defying car chases.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Add this Best Picture nominee about the life of singer Ray Charles (1930-2004) to the list of great screen bios. Best Actor Jamie Foxx is fantastic, bringing lots of heart and tons of soul to his portrayal of the music legend.

programme.title: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: Entombed for 200 years after betraying a witch, 18th-century vampire Barnabas Collins returns to his mansion in 1972, only to find his estate in ruins and his family plagued by macabre secrets in this deliciously gothic remake of the classic TV series.

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: A Bengali family tries to acclimate to life in the U.S. in this poignant and bittersweet saga of cultures clashing across generations. Their teenage son (Kal Penn) does not embrace their Indian heritage until he visits Calcutta, where he gains an understanding of the importance of his family's past. Indian-born Mira Nair directed from a script by Sooni Taraporevala, who adapted Pulitzer Prize-winner Jhumpa Lahiri's novel. Bollywood superstar Tabu costars as Penn's old-world mother.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Buckle up for a wild ride as Paul Walker (\"Joy Ride\") and Vin Diesel (\"Pitch Black\") put the pedal to the metal in this high-octane action thriller. Diesel plays the leader of a gang of L.A. street racers who moonlight in highway robbery; Walker is the undercover cop who befriends him. Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Rick Yune, Chad Lindberg.

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.sub-title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel Xxxx21 - #287
programme.desc: An award-winning monthly sports journalism series with investigative pieces and in-depth profiles from across the sports spectrum.

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Prof. Charles Xavier (James McAvoy) and Magneto (Michael Fassbender) assemble a team of superpowered mutants in order to save mankind from nuclear annihilation in this action-powered comic-book prequel, which depicts the formation of the X-Men and the origins of Xavier and Magneto's ideological rivalry.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: This documentary provides an intimate look at the life and career of iconic American-born singer Tina Turner. It explores her early life in Brownsville, Tennessee, her unexpected rise to fame in the 1960s, the upheavals in her personal and professional life, and her unexpected career resurgence and superstardom in the 1980s.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: A bomber has rigged a bus with a bomb and a cop must get on-board while it is traveling to figure out how to get the passengers off.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: As the rivalry between Fred and the Watkins intensifies, 8chan is relaunched as \"8kun,\" where Q re-emerges after months being offline. Meanwhile, ex-military and political operatives aim to tap the power of Q. Back in Manila, Jim slaps Fred with a lawsuit, forcing him to plan a great escape.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: Series finale. With the world in lockdown from COVID-19, Q's wild theories draw in new followers and get amplified by major political figures, all of which culminate in the siege at the U.S. Capitol. Reflecting on years of his collected evidence, Cullen draws conclusions on who is behind QAnon and its future impact.

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: An innocent teen vacationing with her upper-middle-class parents at an upscale resort in the 1960s Catskills gets a jolt of culture shock when she crushes on the hotel's slick, handsome dance instructor. The soundtrack yielded the Oscar-winning Best Song \"(I've Had the) Time of My Life.\".

programme.title: Moonwalk With Me
programme.desc: A Korean American girl haunted by her father's disappearances must decide between keeping her drifting father grounded or letting him go.

programme.title: Wendy
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Louisiana girl journeys to an exciting, ethereal and tropical island jungle called Neverland where children never grow old. However, her whimsical, carefree behavior is soon marred by the realization of what happens when mortality descends on the young.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During Christmas break, a group of female students realizes someone is watching their every move. While pledging for a sorority, they realize that their stalker is a murderer operating out of a secret society in their college's shady underbelly. The girls then decide to take matters into their own hands in order to rid themselves of this presence once and for all.

programme.title: Jojo Rabbit
programme.desc: It is the latter part of World War II, and all Jojo Betzler wants is to become a Nazi. He turns to his 10-year-old imagination and begins to befriend a wackier version of Nazi Germany's ruler, Adolf Hitler. One day, he finds out that his mother, Rosie, is housing a Jewish girl named Elsa. Despite going directly against his young beliefs, he has no choice but to keep quiet for his and his family's safety. Soon, he and his imaginary friend begin to see the world differently.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: This documentary provides an intimate look at the life and career of iconic American-born singer Tina Turner. It explores her early life in Brownsville, Tennessee, her unexpected rise to fame in the 1960s, the upheavals in her personal and professional life, and her unexpected career resurgence and superstardom in the 1980s.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan stars as a volcanologist in this action-packed thriller featuring impressive special effects. Harry Dalton (Brosnan) warns a Washington town of an impending eruption, but its residents are reluctant to evacuate...until it's too late. Linda Hamilton.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Driven insane by the disregard shown toward him by Gotham City's inhabitants, failed stand-up comedian Arthur Fleck turns to a life of crime as the Joker. With seemingly everyone paying attention to his reign of terror, Joker soon becomes an icon of fear and, to some, inspiration.

programme.title: Ford v Ferrari
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Ferrari is an untouchable figure in racing. With Enzo Ferrari ardently chasing after excellence, the company is irrefutably the best there is. Ford's Henry Ford II wants in on the success, and so he journeys to Italy to propose a merger with the automobile giant. His plan, however, is met with ridicule. With a hurt ego, he enlists the help of car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles to build a car that would defeat Ferrari at the 1966 24 Hours of Le Mans.

programme.title: Exterminate All the Brutes
programme.sub-title: Part 1: The Disturbing Confidence of Ignorance
programme.desc: Filmmaker Raoul Peck examines the intertwined currents of hate and bigotry running through history. Focusing on the United States' legacy as a colonial power, Peck explores how race first became institutionalized, the Nazi program of \"elimination\" and its antecedents in the West, and the looting of the African continent in a \"gentlemen's agreement.\" Series premiere.

programme.title: Exterminate All the Brutes
programme.sub-title: Part 2: Who the F*** Is Columbus
programme.desc: Revisiting the stories of Christopher Columbus, the Alamo and the Trail of Tears from an indigenous perspective, Raoul Peck shows how \"official\" history is shaped by those in power and solidified by myth and popular culture. Later, he examines the \"doctrine of discovery\" used to justify the enslavement of millions of Africans and questions his own story within these narratives.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan stars as a volcanologist in this action-packed thriller featuring impressive special effects. Harry Dalton (Brosnan) warns a Washington town of an impending eruption, but its residents are reluctant to evacuate...until it's too late. Linda Hamilton.

programme.title: Man on a Ledge
programme.desc: An NYPD hostage negotiator attempts to talk cop-turned-fugitive Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) down from a high ledge, but she learns that he may have a hidden motive for threatening to take his own life in this pulse-pounding thriller.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins has his third go-round as Hannibal \"The Cannibal\" Lecter in this chilling 2002 remake of 1986's \"Manhunter.\" This time, the not-so-good doctor shares his expertise with an FBI agent (Edward Norton) who is tracking a serial killer known as \"The Tooth Fairy.\" Ralph Fiennes, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Emily Watson, Harvey Keitel, Frankie Faison.

programme.title: The Pledge
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson is haunting as Jerry Black, a retired detective who promises the parents of a young homicide victim that he will find her murderer. Jerry throws himself into the case and discovers the crime may have been committed by a serial killer. Sean Penn directed. Robin Wright Penn, Sam Shepard, Vanessa Redgrave, Aaron Eckhart, Benicio Del Toro, Mickey Rourke, Helen Mirren.

programme.title: City Slickers
programme.desc: Three New Yorkers sign up for a cattle drive on a western dude ranch in this comedic farce. Jack Palance won a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a grizzled trail boss who leads the urban tenderfoots.

programme.title: Under the Grapefruit Tree: The CC Sabathia Story
programme.desc: CC Sabathia reflects on his pitching journey as well as the challenges that shaped him.

programme.title: A Hidden Life (?)
programme.desc: Franz Jägerstätter refuses to fight for the Nazis in World War II.

programme.title: The King Of Staten Island: The Making Of
programme.desc: A quick preview of the film 'The King of Staten Island' is presented.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: A bomber has rigged a bus with a bomb and a cop must get on-board while it is traveling to figure out how to get the passengers off.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: A giant moth named Mothra, an enormous Pteranodon called Rodan, and a three-headed dragon dubbed King Ghidora wreak havoc on humanity as they battle each other. For Earth to survive, Godzilla has to put a stop to the three titans and the destruction they bring.

programme.title: Chips
programme.desc: A maverick motorbike racer and a California Highway Patrol cop who's secretly an FBI operative must overcome their personality mismatch and work together to uncover a major theft in this thrilling big-screen adaptation of the famous TV series from the 1970s and '80s.

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: Christopher Krebs; Caitlin Flanagan; Bret Stephens
programme.desc: Former Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency director Christopher Krebs is interviewed. The panelists are writers Caitlin Flanagan (Atlantic) and Bret Stephens (New York Times).

programme.title: The Comebacks
programme.desc: David Koechner (\"Anchorman\") stars as a struggling college football coach who tries to lead his ragtag team to victory while dealing with family problems in this outrageous comedy, which spoofs some of the greatest inspirational sports films ever made. Carl Weathers, Melora Hardin, Matthew Lawrence, Brooke Nevin. Directed by Tom Brady.

programme.title: The Day Sports Stood Still
programme.desc: Chronicling the events of March 11, 2020, as the reality of COVID-19 shut down sports in the U.S., beginning with the Jazz-Thunder NBA game in Oklahoma City. OKC guard Chris Paul was on the court and serves as an executive producer of the documentary, which also features NBA commissioner Adam Silver; Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban; NBA Players Association executive director Michele Roberts; Donovan Mitchell; Danilo Gallinari; and Karl-Anthony Towns.

programme.title: Wolves at the Door
programme.desc: In 1969, four friends throwing a farewell party find themselves hunted by mysterious strangers outside their house.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: \"Fatal Attraction\" director Adrian Lyne tackles infidelity once again with this involving erotic thriller. Oscar nominee Diane Lane and Richard Gere are superb as a happily married couple whose union is threatened when the wife begins an affair with an attractive book dealer (Olivier Martinez). Erik Per Sullivan, Myra Lucretia Taylor.

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. It's the story of a man who reflects on his messy love life while paying meticulous attention to all things vinyl. The charmer is based on the novel by Nick Hornby. Iben Hjejle, Jack Black, Todd Louiso, Joan Cusack, Tim Robbins, Lisa Bonet.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: This documentary provides an intimate look at the life and career of iconic American-born singer Tina Turner. It explores her early life in Brownsville, Tennessee, her unexpected rise to fame in the 1960s, the upheavals in her personal and professional life, and her unexpected career resurgence and superstardom in the 1980s.

programme.title: 2 Dope Queens
programme.desc: Jessica and Phoebe are joined onstage by Janet Mock, who talks about Ball Culture and her favorite music artists; and Lizzo, who teaches the Queens to play the flute.

programme.title: Zoetic
programme.desc: A 60-year-old Chinese immigrant mother reluctantly agrees to maneuver the world of online dating appswith the help of her daughter.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone wrote, directed and stars in this knockout sixth go-round in the ring cycle, in which the never-say-die Philadelphia palooka comes out of retirement to fight reigning champ Mason \"The Line\" Dixon.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Action and adventure erupt yet again when the evil mummy returns in this effects-laden sequel to the 1999 hit. In 1933, Rick and Evie's son Alex joins the gang to take on the resurrected Imhotep, who's battling the Scorpion King for world domination. Brendan Fraser, Arnold Vosloo, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Oded Fehr, Freddie Boath.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: An underwater research team is highly involved in a drilling operation to look for oil at the bottom of the Mariana Trench. As an earthquake destroys their laboratory in the depths of the ocean, the team must now work together on a plan to insure their safety. However, the crew soon discovers that there is something dangerous in their midst.

programme.title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix (?)
programme.desc: The X-MEN battle against one of their own whose powers have corrupted her into an evil force of nature. But time is running out for the X-MEN who must beat this new entity and defend the planet against incoming aliens who plan to use this force for evil.

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: An NYC condo manager (Ben Stiller) and his staff plot to rob the penthouse of a thieving Wall Street billionaire who defrauded them out of their savings in this hysterical crime comedy. But they'll need the help of a crafty thief to execute the heist.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: In this terrifying remake, a couple think they've found a dream house in Amityville, Long Island, but they soon learn that the home has a dark history. A year before, a man living in the house murdered his family in their sleep, claiming he was commanded to commit the crime by demons.

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.sub-title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel Xxxx21 - #287
programme.desc: An award-winning monthly sports journalism series with investigative pieces and in-depth profiles from across the sports spectrum.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A domestic abuse survivor grows convinced that her wealthy scientist ex-boyfriend has discovered a way to make himself invisible and is stalking her after faking his own death and leaving her a part of his fortune.

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: A couple named Tom and Violet find their wedding plans interrupted by a number of surprises over the course of five years in this endearing romantic comedy, as Violet must move to Michigan for school and Tom is frustrated by missed job opportunities.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.sub-title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver 216

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: As the rivalry between Fred and the Watkins intensifies, 8chan is relaunched as \"8kun,\" where Q re-emerges after months being offline. Meanwhile, ex-military and political operatives aim to tap the power of Q. Back in Manila, Jim slaps Fred with a lawsuit, forcing him to plan a great escape.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: Series finale. With the world in lockdown from COVID-19, Q's wild theories draw in new followers and get amplified by major political figures, all of which culminate in the siege at the U.S. Capitol. Reflecting on years of his collected evidence, Cullen draws conclusions on who is behind QAnon and its future impact.

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevenson's career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: Sue Ann, a lonely middle-aged woman, strikes up an unlikely friendship with a circle of teenagers. She offers to let them use her house as their party spot until unusual and unnerving episodes begin unfolding, causing the teens to question their host and her motives.

programme.title: The Dead Don't Die
programme.desc: Unusual occurrences begin to unfold in the small and uneventful town of Centerville, from animals behaving oddly to irregular periods of daylight. However, the most unexpected event proves to be the most serious as corpses begin to leave their graves to attack the townspeople.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawley family prepares for an official royal visit to their family house in Yorkshire in 1927. They experience physical, social, and psychological upheavals as King George V, Queen Mary, and their royal entourage descend on the eponymous mansion.

programme.title: Saudi Women's Driving School
programme.desc: A look at the lives of self-reliant women in Saudi Arabia who challenge Western stereotypes of their country's gender dynamics, while exercising their long-awaited right to drive. In September 2017, King Salman announced by royal decree that he was removing the ban on female drivers, and the capital city of Riyadh became the home of the largest driving school in the world, operated exclusively by and for women.

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: Nick Cannon (\"Roll Bounce\") stars in this funny and fast-paced action comedy as a rookie bike cop who goes undercover at an elite prep school to break up a crime ring. Roselyn Sanchez, Shawn Ashmore, Angelo Spizzirri. Directed by Marcos Siega.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A tepid hockey player takes up tournament golf to raise cash for his grandmother, who is about to lose her house.

programme.title: Don't Let Go
programme.desc: Mourning the loss of three of his family members, a detective receives a haunting phone call from his deceased niece, who is existing on an alternate timeline two weeks prior. It is now up to Jack to talk her through the coming days to save her and her family's lives in this mystery thriller.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's delirious, highly stylized homage to samurai films, kung-fu movies and spaghetti Westerns. Uma Thurman stars as an assassin who awakens from a four-year coma and seeks revenge on those who left her for dead on her wedding day.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's highly stylized revenge saga comes to a bloody good conclusion as the Bride continues to avenge her wedding-day massacre. After eliminating one enemy after another, the stage is set for an epic showdown with her former boss and lover.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: As the rivalry between Fred and the Watkins intensifies, 8chan is relaunched as \"8kun,\" where Q re-emerges after months being offline. Meanwhile, ex-military and political operatives aim to tap the power of Q. Back in Manila, Jim slaps Fred with a lawsuit, forcing him to plan a great escape.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: Series finale. With the world in lockdown from COVID-19, Q's wild theories draw in new followers and get amplified by major political figures, all of which culminate in the siege at the U.S. Capitol. Reflecting on years of his collected evidence, Cullen draws conclusions on who is behind QAnon and its future impact.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: The seductive Kathryn (Sarah Michelle Gellar) poses the ultimate challenge to her charming stepbrother, Sebastian (Ryan Phillippe). If he can deflower the headmaster's virgin daughter (Reese Witherspoon), then Sebastian can have Kathryn for one night. If he fails, she gets his vintage car.

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: In this hilariously raunchy comedy, an aspiring reporter races to an important job interview following a one-night stand that leaves her stranded in downtown Los Angeles. To make matters worse, she's been left without a phone, car, money or ID.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: A hotshot district attorney contends with a killer following a deadly hit and run that ties their fates together in this white-knuckle thriller. After acquitting the accused of the crime that he himself committed, the DA finds his family in danger and his future in jeopardy.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: In this stunning sci-fi sequel, a cop known as K hunts down android laborers who have gone rogue. But when he uncovers a conspiracy involving the robots, K searches for the one person who might have answers: a law-enforcement agent who once had his job.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: A life-changing journey to East Africa causes a former gang member (Gerard Butler) to dedicate his life to rescuing children who were captured and trained as soldiers by the Lord's Resistance Army in this inspirational drama based on actual events.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: In this unforgettable tale of romance, Iraq War veteran Logan Thibault tracks down a woman from a photo that he credits with keeping him alive during three tours of duty, and he begins to suspect that she is the love of his life.

programme.title: Marvin's Room
programme.desc: Diane Keaton received a Best Actress nomination for her role in this moving drama as a loving caregiver who must make plans for her elderly father (Hume Cronyn) when she is diagnosed with leukemia. Meryl Streep costars as her estranged sister, a selfish woman with a troubled teen son (Leonardo DiCaprio). Robert De Niro, Gwen Verdon.

programme.title: Lying and Stealing
programme.desc: An aspiring actress trying to escape her dubious con artist past and an art thief attempting to leave the game team up in Los Angeles to pull off the heist to end all heists, to gain their liberation.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Richard Gere and Oscar nominee Edward Norton star in this intense courtroom drama. Gere plays slick lawyer Martin Vail, who agrees to defend a guileless 19-year-old (Norton) who has been accused in the brutal murder of the Archbishop of Chicago. Though Vail sees the case as a way to gain publicity, the revelations in the case begin to chill him.

programme.title: Abandon
programme.desc: A bright college student is haunted by her past in this atmospheric thriller. Katie Burke is a driven senior at a prestigious college whose boyfriend, Embry, vanished years earlier. Katie's life unravels when a cop investigates the disappearance and Embry begins showing up on campus.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: This nail-biting thriller follows smuggler Chris Farraday (Mark Wahlberg) as he faces ruthless drug lords, vicious criminals, corrupt officials and trigger-happy hit men in a bid to help his desperate brother-in-law settle a debt.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: In this winning comedy, a kindhearted Florida stripper becomes a Las Vegas cocktail waitress and forms a lucrative partnership with a professional sports gambler. But when the gambler's wife turns jealous, all bets are off.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: In this high-flying comedy, Uma Thurman gives a superb performance as a shrewish, possessive superhero who gets dumped by her regular-Joe boyfriend (Luke Wilson), and then decides to use her superpowers to exact revenge on him and his new love (Anna Faris). In a hilarious nod to \"Fatal Attraction,\" Thurman substitutes live great-white-shark sushi for the boiled bunny. Directed by Ivan Reitman and written by Don Payne, who has scripted episodes of \"The Simpsons.\".

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: This warmhearted dramedy centers on Ryan Bingham, who works for a company that specializes in firing people. Ryan is soon forced to take a newcomer along on a business trip in order to show her firsthand what he does, and he begins to reflect on his lonely life and develops a relationship with fellow frequent flyer Alex Goran.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: In the Coen brothers' stirring remake of the John Wayne classic, an alcoholic U.S. Marshal and an independent-minded 14-year-old girl track down her father's killer with the help of a Texas Ranger. As the three brave dangerous Indian territory, they discover their prey has fallen in with a more-experienced criminal.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: In this dazzling sci-fi epic, the crew of a spaceship embark on a voyage to a distant planet in hopes of discovering the origins of the human race, but instead they unleash a horrifying menace that could spell mankind's extinction.

programme.title: Butter
programme.desc: In this gentle social satire, Laura Pickler competes against an adopted black girl named Destiny in a butter-carving competition after her champion husband can't compete. An obsessed Laura pulls out every ruse she can in an effort to attain victory.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
programme.desc: The 35-year-old novelist Kate Conklin is still reeling from the recent breakup with her fiancé. Upon the launch of her new book, she receives an invitation from her old college professor, David, to visit her alma mater and give a talk to his students. To distract her from the breakup grief, Kate accepts and rediscovers her college, but now through the eyes of the students living there.

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: In this timely comedy about millennial malaise, a couple who recently graduated from college try to hack it in the real world. He learns that his writing internship will no longer lead to a job, while she is laid off from her first post-grad position.

programme.title: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
programme.desc: A sarcastic police office is tasked with training neighborhood watch groups, while his commander's job is threatened by a conniving captain.

programme.title: How to Make an American Quilt
programme.desc: During a summerlong visit with her grandmother and great-aunt, a recently engaged graduate student embarks on a journey of self-discovery—guided by the women in a local quilting circle, who offer advice and share stories of their lives.

programme.title: The Four Feathers
programme.desc: A hot cast energizes this thrilling version of A.E.W. Mason's classic adventure tale. A British army officer is disowned by his family, friends and fiancée after being branded a coward. Determined to redeem his name, he undertakes a dangerous mission in the Sudan.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Martial arts master Jet Li stars in this stylized action adventure from acclaimed director Zhang Yimou. The \"Rashomon\"-style epic centers on a swordsman who claims to have saved a ruthless Chinese emperor from a trio of assassins.

programme.title: Little Children
programme.desc: Best Actress nominee Kate Winslet gives a tour-de-force performance in this gripping and incisive slice of suburban life set in Massachusetts. She plays an unhappy housewife who enters into a ruinous affair with a restless stay-at-home dad (Patrick Wilson). Best Supporting Actor nominee Jackie Earle Haley costars as a paroled pedophile trying to jump-start his life. Directed by Todd Field, who co-wrote the script with Tom Perrotta, upon whose novel the Oscar-nominated screenplay is based.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: In this touching romantic drama, a working-class woman (Anne Hathaway) and a wealthy playboy (Jim Sturgess) reunite every July 15 for 20 years. Over the course of two decades, they experience the highs and lows of life and consider becoming a couple. Directed by Lone Scherfig.

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock returns as Annie, the spunky heroine from \"Speed,\" as she joins her new beau, Alex (Jason Patric), on an ocean liner. Unfortunately, also aboard is a madman who takes control of the ship and threatens to sink her in a plot to steal millions in jewels and seek revenge for his devastating illness. Willem Dafoe, Temuera Morrison, Brian McCardie.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a child successfully wishes that his teddy bear could come to life, but he gets more than he bargained for when the stuffed animal follows him into adulthood and complicates his relationship with a beautiful woman.

programme.title: The Watch
programme.desc: Four suburbanites stumble upon an alien invasion while volunteering as a neighborhood-watch group, and they fight to protect their block from evil extraterrestrials in this madcap sci-fi comedy.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: A collector for the mob travels to L.A. to get a payment from a Hollywood producer, and discovers his skills in the world of organized crime translate to the movie business in this showbiz comedy. After helping a producer land a big-name actor for a script, he also helps the compromised man get out of a relationship with a powerful drug dealer.

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: In this slick comedy, mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie biz for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer.

programme.title: Backdraft
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated special effects ignite this tale of combative firefighting siblings searching for a deadly arsonist. The film was written by former firefighter Gregory Widen and filmed in Chicago, where real city firemen served as extras.

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage discovers that it's a wonderful life in this touching comic fantasy. He plays a rich, ruthless businessman who's shown the life he might have had by a guardian angel (Don Cheadle) who transforms him into a suburban working stiff with a wife (Tea Leoni), kids and minivan. Brett Ratner directed. Jeremy Piven, Saul Rubinek, Josef Sommer, Makenzie Vega.

programme.title: Lonely Blue Night
programme.desc: An awkward family reunion at a business dinner leads a Chinese mother to realize the consequences of leaving her daughter in the care of an American homestay family.

programme.title: Man on a Ledge
programme.desc: An NYPD hostage negotiator attempts to talk cop-turned-fugitive Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) down from a high ledge, but she learns that he may have a hidden motive for threatening to take his own life in this pulse-pounding thriller.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An army of alien spaceships attack Earth and threaten to destroy the human race, but a handful of survivors band together to stop the invasion.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: In this well-acted fantasy about changing history, James Caviezel plays a grieving cop who hears the voice of his dead father (Dennis Quaid) while experimenting with a ham-radio set. Together, they try to stop the events that led to the man's death. Andre Braugher.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: In 1942, a few months after the infamous Pearl Harbor attack and a few years before World War II ended, the Japanese forces were once again planning to stage a sudden attack against their opponents this time near the Midway Atoll. Their plan, however, was intercepted, and the American forces arrived at the Pacific Ocean theater just in time to stop them. The battle lasted for three days, and its outcome became a critical turning point in the ongoing war.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding ride, a rookie CIA operative (Ryan Reynolds) goes on the run with a rogue former intelligence officer (Denzel Washington) after a South African safe house comes under attack by heavily armed mercenaries.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.sub-title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver 216

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: In this unforgettable tale of romance, Iraq War veteran Logan Thibault tracks down a woman from a photo that he credits with keeping him alive during three tours of duty, and he begins to suspect that she is the love of his life.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: As the rivalry between Fred and the Watkins intensifies, 8chan is relaunched as \"8kun,\" where Q re-emerges after months being offline. Meanwhile, ex-military and political operatives aim to tap the power of Q. Back in Manila, Jim slaps Fred with a lawsuit, forcing him to plan a great escape.

programme.title: Q: Into the Storm
programme.desc: Series finale. With the world in lockdown from COVID-19, Q's wild theories draw in new followers and get amplified by major political figures, all of which culminate in the siege at the U.S. Capitol. Reflecting on years of his collected evidence, Cullen draws conclusions on who is behind QAnon and its future impact.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: Gary, a political strategist, thinks that the key to converting supporters for their Democratic National Committee is backing the mayoral bid of a retired US Marine in a predominantly right-wing town in Wisconsin. But when the Republican National Committee discovers this strategy, they send in their best political strategist, Faith, who happens to be Gary's long-time nemesis in the political arena.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: In this sprawling epic about America, a young man in 1860s New York City seeks to avenge his father's death decades earlier at the hands of a hardened gang leader during a large skirmish between warring clans. He befriends the brutal crime lord, gaining his trust in order to get close enough to exact revenge.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Ray Stevenson does a bang-up job as Frank Castle, AKA the Punisher, the tough-guy vigilante from the Marvel Comics series. In this explosive installment, he's in New York City to take on a ruthless scar-faced mob boss named Jigsaw (Dominic West). Wayne Knight is a blast as Microchip, the Punisher's weapons-supplying expert. Julie Benz, Dash Mihok, Colin Salmon, Doug Hutchison, T.J. Storm. Directed by Lexi Alexander.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: In this sequel to \"The Shining,\" an adult Dan Torrance befriends a young girl with similar psychic powers as himself. They join forces against The True Knot: An evil cult that exploits children with supernatural powers in their quest for immortality.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: This riveting historical drama depicts the early days of Winston Churchill's leadership of the U.K. during WWII, as he tries to rally the nation to action while many of his contemporaries advocate peace talks with Hitler.

programme.title: Won't Back Down
programme.desc: In this riveting drama, two headstrong mothers wage a valiant struggle to save their children's troubled inner-city school, but find their forward-thinking efforts hampered at every turn by apathy and systematic bureaucracy.

programme.title: Victoria and Abdul
programme.desc: In this striking period piece, Queen Victoria forges an unlikely bond with an Indian clerk who traveled to London for her Golden Jubilee. The pair eventually become lifelong friends, although the Queen's inner circle are horrified by their relationship.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: After meeting Quint, the father of his daughter's boyfriend, Drew, a local real estate agent, decides to invest in his latest hedge fund, though through illegal means. It signals the start of many troubles for him, which is only amplified by the revelation that his wife, Ronnie, is expecting twins. When an unintentional manslaughter takes place, the complicated relations between the two families become even more tangled.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon, Jude Law and Gwyneth Paltrow star in this chilling adaptation of Patricia Highsmith's novel about a social-climbing psychopath. Damon is superb as Tom Ripley, a charming mimic whose obsession with a wealthy playboy (Law) turns deadly. Cate Blanchett, Philip Seymour Hoffman. Directed by Anthony Minghella.

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story
programme.desc: After killing himself, a young man enters a strange purgatory and tries to find his ex-girlfriend, who has also committed suicide. Patrick Fugit and Shannyn Sossamon star in this twisted black comedy.

programme.title: The Hoax
programme.desc: Richard Gere is a fascinating portrait in brazen panache as disgraced author and con artist Clifford Irving, who tricked the public in the early 1970s by claiming to have written an \"authorized\" biography of eccentric billionaire Howard Hughes. Marcia Gay Harden is excellent as Irving's misguided wife, and Alfred Molina gives a captivating performance as the author's right-hand man, who's fully aware that Irving has something up his sleeve. Directed by Lasse Hallstrom. Julie Delpy, Hope Davis.

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: A portrait of an irreverent Armed Forces Radio deejay in Saigon during the Vietnam War.

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Chris Rock co-wrote, directed and stars in this hilarious romantic comedy about a married man whose incessant fantasies about cheating are put to the test when he runs into a friend's beautiful ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: Paul Weitz (\"About a Boy\") directed this appealing and perceptive dramedy starring Dennis Quaid as a middle-aged ad exec who is demoted. Enter Topher Grace as his new boss, a 26-year-old hotshot who falls for Quaid's young daughter.

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love
programme.desc: Screenwriter-director Paul Thomas Anderson (\"Boogie Nights\") turns romantic comedies upside down with this bizarre and provocative character study. Adam Sandler is superb as an unstable businessman who's trying to woo his sister's eccentric friend (Emily Watson) despite considerable emotional baggage. Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Bordertown
programme.desc: In this gripping fact-based crime drama, Jennifer Lopez gives an astounding performance as a dogged and determined American journalist who is dispatched to Mexico to investigate the unsolved murders of 400 local women, many of whom worked for U.S.-backed companies in an out-of-the-way, south-of-the-border factory town. Antonio Banderas is excellent as her former lover, a crusading Mexican newspaper editor who helps her. Written and directed by Gregory Nava. Martin Sheen, Maya Zapata.

programme.title: The Evil Dead (?)
programme.desc: Five vacationing college teens make an unplanned stopover in an abandoned mountain cabin surrounded by dense woods, where they discover an ancient-looking occult tome. Later, an ominous presence from the depths of the forest emerges, and things quickly become life-threatening for the coeds.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Big laughs abound when two top CIA spies find their enduring friendship put to the ultimate test when they engage in an all-out battle to win the affections of a beautiful woman after they discover they are both dating her.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Sean and his stepfather Hank (Dwayne Johnson) travel to a lost island with strange creatures and untold treasures after receiving a cryptic distress signal in this exciting sequel to 2008's \"Journey to the Center of the Earth.\" Along with a helicopter pilot and his daughter, they race to rescue the sole inhabitant as a massive tidal wave threatens to destroy the island.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Inspirational documentary that follows two high-school basketball players over four years as they set their sights on college scholarships and a chance to play in the NBA.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: After a life-altering expedition into deep space, Lucy Cola, an astronaut, must return to Earth and reintegrate into everyday life. However, Lucy's cosmic experiences begin to take a toll on her connection to the real world as she spirals into a mental state that her world is too small to contain.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: In this modern retelling of Shakespeare's hilarious battle-of-the-sexes comedy, a bickering man and woman are tricked into falling in love as a wedding is jeopardized by malicious rumors about the bride-to-be.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: Thumbs up to this cosmic comic joyride adapted from the Douglas Adams sci-fi cult adventures. Mos Def is a blast as alien planet-trotter Ford Prefect, and Martin Freeman is equally fun as earthling Arthur Dent, his traveling companion and best friend. Sam Rockwell costars as Ford's cousin, Zaphod Beeblebrox, a galactic president with three arms and two heads. The animatronic monsters were designed by Jim Henson's Creature Shop. Zooey Deschanel, John Malkovich, Bill Nighy, Anna Chancellor.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In this harrowing historical drama set in the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days.

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: After a clash with Teijo, a wanted criminal, results in the death of his partner Morris, LAPD detective Vic vows to track down the man and exact revenge. When he gets a lead as to where his man might be, Vic, visually-impaired because of a Lasik surgery, orders an Uber ride and meets the witty and mild-mannered Stu, his driver. Stu now has to go through the wild goose chase with Vic, all the while avoiding danger and a one-star rating.

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: In this witty, luminous and bittersweet comedy, the grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing.

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, cop-turned-con artist Steven Russell (Jim Carrey) ends up in jail and meets fellow inmate Phillip Morris (Ewan McGregor), who becomes the love of his life. For years, Steven plots cons in order to free both of them from prison and earn enough money so they can live comfortably on the outside.

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Delicious adaptation of Oscar Wilde's 1895 play about a rising young politician who is blackmailed by a socialite, which touches off a series of misunderstandings, romantic complications and drawing-room intrigues.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: In this remarkable tale, a man is born in New Orleans just after World War I, but he is already in his eighties and then proceeds to live his life aging in reverse into the 21st century, experiencing joy and sadness, loves lost and found, and the meaning of timelessness.

programme.title: Precious (?)
programme.desc: This inspirational drama centers on an illiterate, pregnant teen with little hope for the future, until the opportunity to attend an alternative school changes the course of her life.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Sudanese refugees get a second chance at life when a humanitarian effort brings them to America.

programme.title: Impostor (?)
programme.desc: Gary Sinise stars in the mind-bending director's cut of a classic story by legendary science-fiction author Philip K. Dick (\"Minority Report\"). In the year 2079, a military scientist (Sinise) desperately tries to prove his true identity after he's accused of being a booby-trapped alien spy. Vincent D'Onofrio, Madeleine Stowe, Tony Shalhoub.

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Colin Farrell star in this taut thriller from Roger Donaldson, the director of \"No Way Out\" and \"Thirteen Days.\" Pacino plays a CIA operative who recruits a computer whiz to find a mole in the agency's ranks. While studying at the agency's secret training camp, the recruit falls for a fellow student and learns that nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: This riveting historical drama depicts the early days of Winston Churchill's leadership of the U.K. during WWII, as he tries to rally the nation to action while many of his contemporaries advocate peace talks with Hitler.

programme.title: The Debt
programme.desc: In this taut thriller, celebrated Mossad agent Rachel Singer must find out the truth when a man appears claiming to be the Nazi war criminal she supposedly killed 30 years earlier, during a mission that made her a legend.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A former marine returns to Vietnam to rescue his friend from a sadistic general. Thomas Ian Griffith, Chris Mulkey, Hillary Matthews.

programme.title: Idlewild
programme.desc: OutKast's André Benjamin and Antwan A. Patton (aka André 3000 and Big Boi) rock the house in this electrifying tale of a piano player and the manager of a 1930s southern speakeasy. Paula Patton, Terrence Howard, Faizon Love, Malinda Williams. Written and directed by Bryan Barber.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: Four college buddies find themselves on the adventure of their lives, when on the morning after a Las Vegas bachelor party, they end up stranded deep in Mexico penniless, being chased, falling in love, and fighting to make it back across the border in time for the wedding.

programme.title: Benny & Joon
programme.desc: A repair-shop owner is in charge of taking care of his mentally ill sister. A losing bet forces him to also take in his friend's eccentric cousin, who immediately hits it off with his sister.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim (Jason Biggs), Michelle and the rest of the gang return to East Great Falls for their 10-year high-school reunion in this poignant comedy. Meanwhile, Finch still looks back with lust at that perfect night he spent with Stiffler's mom.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Decourcy increases pressure on the Justice Department, but Jackie counters by looking into his adversary's romantic past. While Jackie's digging up dirt, Siobhan is planning ahead, focused on starting a family even as Decourcy remains preoccupied by the escalating conflict. Jenny realizes she can't keep ignoring her mother after an unsettling phone call. With business at the salon all but dead, Cathy Ryan turns to an unlikely income source.

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: A reclusive and fiercely independent writer living in the English countryside befriends a young evacuee who is thrust into her care after the London Blitz. His innocence and exuberance helps her come to terms with her former love affair with another woman.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Clive Cussler's thrilling bestseller comes to life in this action-packed adventure. Steve Zahn, Lambert Wilson, Glynn Turman, Delroy Lindo, William H. Macy.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: First entry in the action-thriller series that teamed Mel Gibson and Danny Glover as a seemingly psychotic cop and his common-sense family-man partner, respectively. In this outing, they investigate a woman's plunge from a high-rise and its connection to a drug cartel.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Two L.A. detectives—one a loose cannon, the other a cautious family man—face off with a vicious South African drug cartel that is operating under the cover of diplomatic immunity.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles police detectives battle a cop-turned-criminal who runs an illegal gun operation.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4
programme.desc: As the cop buddy duo of Riggs and Murtaugh start to show their age, they team up with a newcomer to try and defeat a deadly LA gang for good.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative leads a quest into the dangerous African Congo in search of her presumed dead fiancé. Along for the ride is a primatologist, his assistant, a talking gorilla, a Romanian backer with his own agenda and a jungle-savvy mercenary. Based on the novel by Michael Crichton.

programme.title: Lawless

programme.desc: Kev and V announce their big news. Meanwhile, Lip has some promising leads on selling the house, forcing Debbie to reevaluate her future and her romantic history. And later, Ian and Mickey try to adjust to a vastly different life on the West Side.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone (?)
programme.desc: Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire. That successor could be fiery Vincent, but he may also be the spark that turns Michael's hope of business legitimacy into an inferno{ of mob violence. Francis Ford Coppola brings a definitive new edit and restoration of the final film in his epic Godfather trilogy.

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: In this chilling tale, widowed attorney Arthur Kipps (Daniel Radcliffe) is haunted by a vengeful ghost after he travels to a deceased client's secluded country home. In time, Arthur decides to investigate the ghost's intentions.

programme.title: Lucky Grandma
programme.desc: Bad-tempered and recently widowed, 80-year-old Grandma tries her luck at a casino in New York's Chinatown after receiving an auspicious prophecy from a local fortune-teller. Her conspicuous winning streak attracts unwanted attention from local gangsters, prompting her to hire a personal bodyguard.

programme.title: Woman Walks Ahead
programme.desc: A widowed portraitist travels alone to North Dakota in the 1890s to paint Sioux Chief Sitting Bull. There, she confronts antagonism from US Army officers and empathizes with the tribes' desperate struggle for ownership of their ancestral lands.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: Robert, a London-based bohemian artist, has been estranged from his adult son. They travel to Tuscany, Italy, to take care of business left to him by his late wife. He inherits a once beautiful villa, only to see it in a sorry state of disrepair. What turns out to be an initially quick trip becomes an extended stay as father and son try to repair the house, and in the process find their own way of trying to repair their strained relationship.

programme.title: How to Build a Girl
programme.desc: Johanna Morrigan is a smart, funny, and shameless 16-year-old who is set on improving her non-existent social life. One day, her brother Krissi directs her to an ad from a London-based rock magazine that is looking for a writer. Confident in her skills, she submits her review for the Annie soundtrack and as expected, the magazine writes back and she gets the job. Soon, she undergoes a makeover and starts calling herself Dolly Wilde.

programme.title: Shithouse
programme.desc: A homesick and lonely college freshman encounters a dynamic but emotionally guarded sophomore RA at a frat party. Their intimate heart-to-heart exchange leads to a poignant and mutually transformative experience on an emotional and intellectual level.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Struggling author Eddie Morra (Bradley Cooper) overcomes his writer's block with a new drug that unlocks the full potential of his brain, and he forges a partnership with a powerful businessman (Robert De Niro) in this inventive, exciting thriller. Meanwhile, some dangerous characters discover Eddie's secret and come gunning for his dwindling supply of the pharmaceutical.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: An ex-convict tries to go straight, but while running a nightclub his drug-addicted lawyer and an ambitious young criminal make it difficult for him to get out of the life. Meanwhile, he tries to win back the woman he loves who doesn't trust that he's trying to stay on the right side of the law.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Best Picture chronicles the epic tale of a 1940's mobster family in New York City, where the father builds an organized-crime empire and his three sons, to varying degrees, follow in his footsteps. Marlon Brando won Best Actor as the head of the \"family.\".

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Decourcy increases pressure on the Justice Department, but Jackie counters by looking into his adversary's romantic past. While Jackie's digging up dirt, Siobhan is planning ahead, focused on starting a family even as Decourcy remains preoccupied by the escalating conflict. Jenny realizes she can't keep ignoring her mother after an unsettling phone call. With business at the salon all but dead, Cathy Ryan turns to an unlikely income source.

programme.title: Shameless
programme.sub-title: The Fickle Lady Is Calling It Quits
programme.desc: Kev and V announce their big news. Meanwhile, Lip has some promising leads on selling the house, forcing Debbie to reevaluate her future and her romantic history. And later, Ian and Mickey try to adjust to a vastly different life on the West Side.

programme.title: Carlito's Way: Rise to Power
programme.desc: Explosive action and a gritty atmosphere spark this crime drama, a prequel to 1993's \"Carlito's Way.\" Jay Hernandez stars as Carlito Brigante (played by Al Pacino in the first film), a young hustler who rises through the ranks to become a drug czar in New York City's Spanish Harlem. But to sustain his power, Carlito must square off against corrupt cops and a smooth crime lord (Sean Combs). Luis Guzman.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy \"Aces\" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces 2: Assassins' Ball (?)
programme.desc: The world's top assassins go gunning for an FBI desk jockey in this prequel. When word gets out that G-man Walter Weed (Tom Berenger) has a price of $3 million on his head, every killer in the world begins loading up on ammo in hopes of making the hit. But Agent Baker (Clayne Crawford) and his team are determined to keep Weed alive, even if it means taking up arms against the psychotic Tremor family, whose notorious reputation for carnage precedes them.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: A suburban African-American family living in South Florida cope with life, love, and unexpected calamity. Their ambitions for happiness and success are thwarted by a career-ending sports injury and the traumatic aftermath of an unintended murder.

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: A disgraced basketball coach takes a job at a small Indiana high-school and leads the small squad on an improbable run for a state championship. Meanwhile, he helps the town drunk, a former basketball player, redeem himself.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: In this inspirational sports drama based on a true story, a probation officer gives teenage delinquents a chance at redemption by starting a football team at a juvenile-detention camp.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Futuristic thriller about a Detroit police officer who dies in the line of duty but is resurrected as a half-human automaton and programmed to serve justice at any cost—a quest that is often at odds with a thirst for revenge on the thugs who killed him.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie (\"Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels\") wrote and directed this darkly comic crime thriller about an unbelievably large diamond and the big and small-time thieves who try to get their hands on it, with varying degrees of incompetence. Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Brad Pitt, Jason Statham, Vinnie Jones, Alan Ford, Rade Sherbedgia.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In a dystopian future oppressed by global warming, The Humanity Bureau investigates citizens and exiles those not meeting productivity standards. Agent Noah Kross meets a woman and her teenage son who is set for exile and works against his superiors to save him.

programme.title: Arbitrage
programme.desc: In this intense, topical drama, a Wall Street hedge-fund tycoon does his best to maintain a picture-perfect facade as his empire crumbles and he attempts to hide evidence of his financial wrongdoings.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: This sequel follows Vito Corleone's rise to the top of his Mafia family and his son Michael's fall from grace after taking over for his father. Best Picture winner.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Decourcy increases pressure on the Justice Department, but Jackie counters by looking into his adversary's romantic past. While Jackie's digging up dirt, Siobhan is planning ahead, focused on starting a family even as Decourcy remains preoccupied by the escalating conflict. Jenny realizes she can't keep ignoring her mother after an unsettling phone call. With business at the salon all but dead, Cathy Ryan turns to an unlikely income source.

Francis Ford Coppola brings a definitive new edit and restoration of the final film in his epic Godfather trilogy.

programme.sub-title: Egypt's Silent War & Chain of Command

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: The powerful true story of Texas electrician Ron Woodroof, who was diagnosed as HIV positive in 1986, and subsequently devoted his life to providing unapproved drugs and supplements to fellow HIV patients during an era when doctors were still struggling to understand the virus.

programme.title: The Ides of March
programme.desc: In this thought-provoking drama, an idealistic campaign press secretary (Ryan Gosling) works to help a politician (George Clooney) become the Democratic presidential nominee, but a scandal causes him to rethink his loyalties. Clooney also directed.

programme.title: The Babe
programme.desc: A character study of baseball legend George Herman Ruth traces his career from his days as a youngster in an orphanage to his bittersweet bow out and explores the hidden vices—especially drinking—and dark corners of his private life.

programme.title: Mr. Baseball
programme.desc: A burned-out American slugger is traded to a team in Japan, where he's reluctant to embrace his new surroundings.

programme.title: Arbitrage
programme.desc: In this intense, topical drama, a Wall Street hedge-fund tycoon does his best to maintain a picture-perfect facade as his empire crumbles and he attempts to hide evidence of his financial wrongdoings.

programme.title: Relic
programme.desc: When Kay learns that her aging and widowed mother, Edna, has vanished, she and her daughter Sam venture to Edna's remote home in search of the truth. The women soon sense an unsettling presence lurking in the house and possessing Edna, threatening to wreak havoc on the lives of Kay's family.

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: In this insightful adaptation of the popular novel, a timid teenager copes with the pains of adolescence with the help of two new friends, a beautiful high-school senior and her gay stepbrother.

programme.title: Shithouse
programme.desc: A homesick and lonely college freshman encounters a dynamic but emotionally guarded sophomore RA at a frat party. Their intimate heart-to-heart exchange leads to a poignant and mutually transformative experience on an emotional and intellectual level.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: In this charming crowd-pleaser, a bipolar man named Pat attempts to get his life together after spending eight months in an asylum following assault charges. He soon bonds with a promiscuous widow, and offers to be her partner for a dance competition if she'll help him contact his ex-wife.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie (\"Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels\") wrote and directed this darkly comic crime thriller about an unbelievably large diamond and the big and small-time thieves who try to get their hands on it, with varying degrees of incompetence. Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Brad Pitt, Jason Statham, Vinnie Jones, Alan Ford, Rade Sherbedgia.

programme.title: The Loudest Voice
programme.desc: Roger Ailes and media magnate Rupert Murdoch team together to form the Fox News Channel.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Decourcy increases pressure on the Justice Department, but Jackie counters by looking into his adversary's romantic past. While Jackie's digging up dirt, Siobhan is planning ahead, focused on starting a family even as Decourcy remains preoccupied by the escalating conflict. Jenny realizes she can't keep ignoring her mother after an unsettling phone call. With business at the salon all but dead, Cathy Ryan turns to an unlikely income source.

programme.title: VICE
programme.sub-title: Egypt's Silent War & Chain of Command

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: In this intense and sweeping drama, a troubled U.S. Navy veteran returns home from World War II and is taken under the wing of a charismatic religious leader.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Futuristic thriller about a Detroit police officer who dies in the line of duty but is resurrected as a half-human automaton and programmed to serve justice at any cost—a quest that is often at odds with a thirst for revenge on the thugs who killed him.

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In Spike Lee's brilliant reworking of the cult classic \"Ganja and Hess,\" a doctor develops a voracious thirst for blood after an art curator gives him a cursed artifact. Later, he falls into a treacherous affair with the curator's alluring wife.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Character study of the legendary lawman details the future marshal's childhood and his father's attempts to instill a love of family and the law in his son. As an adult, a tragedy triggers a drunken downward spiral that leads to exploits as a gunslinger. Ultimately, Earp finds redemption as a lawman.

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Sanitation workers witness an altercation through a telescope and find a city official's body in the trash at the same location the next day; they fear being implicated and try to solve the case themselves.

programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: In this masterfully tense thriller, homicide detective Alex Cross pursues a sadistic serial killer obsessed with making his victims suffer, but the case gets personal when the killer targets Cross' loved ones.

programme.title: The Upside
programme.desc: Two mischievous New Yorkers from opposite backgrounds bond as an ex-con is hired to be the caretaker for an affluent quadriplegic. The pair form an unlikely friendship while they show each other how to live life to the fullest in this winning dramedy.

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: An honest, small-town New Jersey sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) is torn between loyalty to his fellow officers and his responsibility to uphold the law after a member of Internal Affairs asks him to help bring down a group of corrupt cops. Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta, Peter Berg, Janeane Garofalo, Robert Patrick, Michael Rapaport, Annabella Sciorra, Noah Emmerich, Cathy Moriarty.

programme.title: Southside With You
programme.desc: Touching docudrama about Barack Obama's first date with Michelle Robinson, his future wife, during the summer of 1989 in Chicago.

programme.title: Amelie
programme.desc: Nominated for five Oscars, this delightful French comedy employs imaginative cinematic tricks to tell the story of a painfully shy Parisian waitress (Audrey Tautou) who secretly does good deeds for others, yet is afraid to accept love in her own life. Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Yolande Moreau.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: The popular stage musical based on the songs of pop sensation ABBA comes to the screen in all its sing-along glory. A bride-to-be (Amanda Seyfried) in Greece attempts to solve the mystery of her paternity by reading the diary of her mother (Meryl Streep). Pierce Brosnan, Stellan Skarsgard and Colin Firth are the likeliest suspects. Christine Baranaski, Julie Walters, Dominic Cooper.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: Meg Ryan and Hugh Jackman are charming in this time-tripping romantic comedy. Jackman plays the Duke of Albany, who is whisked through a portal in time from 1876 to modern-day Manhattan, where a romance begins when he woos a jaded executive (Ryan). Directed by James Mangold (\"Girl, Interrupted\"). Liev Schreiber, Breckin Meyer, Natasha Lyonne.

programme.title: Outlaws (?)
programme.desc: Knuck is the president of a notorious motorcycle gang who was ousted by his former subordinate and now rival Paddo. When his replacement is about to give their drug business to another gang, Knuck must fight enemies both outside and within to regain control of his leadership.

programme.title: eRocktica (?)
programme.desc: An aspiring rock star gets manipulated by a scheming band manager.

programme.title: True History of the Kelly Gang
programme.desc: Set in late 1800s Australia, True History of the Kelly Gang tells the story of Ned Kelly, the leader of one of the most prolific gangs Australia has ever seen. As a young child, Ned is exposed to poverty, familial strife, and oppression. His character is further developed when bushranger Harry Power enters the picture and teaches him how to despise authority. As Ned matures and descends into near-madness, people start to view him as either a hero or a murderer.

programme.title: Grizzly II: Revenge
programme.desc: A ferocious grizzly bear seeks revenge after a poacher kills her cub.

programme.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
programme.desc: Set in small town 1960s America, a terrifying mansion on the outskirts of town is home to a book of scary stories written by a young girl who was imprisoned there. Teens stumble across her book and must face their fears in order to survive.

programme.title: The Current War: Director's Cut (?)
programme.desc: Electricity kingpins George Westinghouse and Thomas Edison find their rivalry escalating, plunging deeper into a brutal race to electrify the United States. Loyalties are tested and lines are crossed as the magnates vie to exert their influence across the nation and also bring their patented electrical system to the entire modern world.

programme.title: On the Basis of Sex
programme.desc: Young wife, mother and lawyer Ruth Bader Ginsburg battles the U.S. Supreme Court for gender equality and women's rights. She works with the American Civil Liberties Union to argue cases on behalf of both men and women, demonstrating that discrimination \"on the basis of sex\" is unconstitutional. Her trailblazing work paved the way for her to become a beloved Supreme Court Justice.

programme.title: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
programme.desc: In this quirky, warmhearted comedy, a scientist going through a midlife crisis agrees to help a sheikh fulfill his dream of bringing sport fishing to the deserts of Yemen. Meanwhile, he falls in love with a young woman hired to be part of the project.

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: In this witty and incisive drama, struggling writer Rory Johnson rockets to fame by passing off a brilliant found manuscript as his own, but he experiences a crisis of conscience after his time in the spotlight changes him in ways he never expected.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Clive Cussler's thrilling bestseller comes to life in this action-packed adventure. Matthew McConaughey stars as an intrepid explorer who helps a doctor (Penelope Cruz) contain a plague in Africa while searching for buried treasure. Breck Eisner directed. Steve Zahn, Lambert Wilson, Glynn Turman, Delroy Lindo, William H. Macy.

programme.title: The Rental
programme.desc: Two young couples rent a scenic oceanside mansion for a celebratory weekend trip. The mood becomes increasingly unnerving as they begin to suspect that their Airbnb host is spying on them – and as the secrets that they have kept from each other begin to be revealed.

programme.title: How to Build a Girl
programme.desc: Johanna Morrigan is a smart, funny, and shameless 16-year-old who is set on improving her non-existent social life. One day, her brother Krissi directs her to an ad from a London-based rock magazine that is looking for a writer. Confident in her skills, she submits her review for the Annie soundtrack and as expected, the magazine writes back and she gets the job. Soon, she undergoes a makeover and starts calling herself Dolly Wilde.

programme.title: The To Do List
programme.desc: In this hilarious and raunchy comedy, a high-school valedictorian makes a list of sexual acts she wants to experience before college, and attempts to seek out the right guys for each task.

programme.title: Men in Kilts: A Roadtrip with Sam and Graham
programme.desc: Sam and Graham set out to discover how they fit into Scotland's feudal clan system, a system forged in war and peace.

programme.title: The Gloaming
programme.desc: Molly's suspicions about Freddie's involvement in the Moxley murder deepen.

programme.title: Men in Kilts: A Roadtrip with Sam and Graham
programme.desc: Sam and Graham set out to discover how they fit into Scotland's feudal clan system, a system forged in war and peace.

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes is back in the thrilling finale to the horror trilogy, as Blade finds himself a wanted man and teams up with a female vampire-hunter (Jessica Biel) for a showdown with the king of the bloodsuckers, Dracula. Ryan Reynolds, Parker Posey, Natasha Lyonne, James Remar, Kris Kristofferson.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A convicted French safecracker allies with a currency counterfeiter to escape from a penal colony on Devil's Island in French Guiana. They endure a life of trying hardship and seemingly endless misery as they wait for the perfect opportunity to escape.

programme.title: 21 Jump Street
programme.desc: Two youthful cops go undercover at a local high school to investigate a violent and dangerous drug ring in this hilarious adaptation of the hit TV series. In the process, they are forced to face the anxieties of adolescence all over again.

programme.title: Oculus
programme.desc: Prepare for the fright of your life as two siblings haunted by a childhood tragedy learn that the source of their fear is a mysterious mirror with a dark history. When one of them reacquires the mirror, the cycle of terror resumes with a vengeance.

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: Mike Judge (Beavis and Butt-head, King of the Hill) takes an edgy look at the workplace with this comedy about a computer programmer (Ron Livingston) who rebels against his employer with surprising results. Jennifer Aniston, Gary Cole, Stephen Root.

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: Crisp dialogue and a zigzagging plot punctuate this taut caper flick. A veteran thief (Gene Hackman) is pressured into one last heist by a greedy gangster (Danny DeVito). But disloyalty and deadly double-crosses threaten to undo the operation when the gangster's hotheaded nephew joins the crew. Delroy Lindo, Sam Rockwell, Ricky Jay. Written and directed by David Mamet.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful, well-plotted and beautifully acted legal thriller, an attorney who's brought a wrongful-death lawsuit against a gun manufacturer, a jury consultant working for the company, and a member of the jury cross paths. The film is based on a John Grisham bestseller.

programme.title: Men in Kilts: A Roadtrip with Sam and Graham
programme.desc: Sam and Graham set out to discover how they fit into Scotland's feudal clan system, a system forged in war and peace.

programme.title: The Gloaming
programme.desc: Molly's suspicions about Freddie's involvement in the Moxley murder deepen.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: A married couple become convinced their house is haunted and set up cameras to capture the malevolent entities on video in this relentlessly terrifying tale of the supernatural.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: While investigating a series of mysterious deaths in the suburbs, a female police detective realizes that a vengeful and malevolent ghost has followed her home. This dangerous spectral presence is the result of a curse that was activated by a gravely unjust death.

programme.title: 21 Jump Street
programme.desc: Two youthful cops go undercover at a local high school to investigate a violent and dangerous drug ring in this hilarious adaptation of the hit TV series. In the process, they are forced to face the anxieties of adolescence all over again.

programme.title: Men in Kilts: A Roadtrip with Sam and Graham
programme.desc: Sam and Graham set out to discover how they fit into Scotland's feudal clan system, a system forged in war and peace.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful, well-plotted and beautifully acted legal thriller, an attorney who's brought a wrongful-death lawsuit against a gun manufacturer, a jury consultant working for the company, and a member of the jury cross paths. The film is based on a John Grisham bestseller.

programme.title: The Gloaming
programme.desc: Molly's suspicions about Freddie's involvement in the Moxley murder deepen.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A sexy thriller about divers who find themselves battling sharks and ruthless criminals after discovering hidden treasure and a crashed plane loaded with cocaine.

programme.title: American Wedding
programme.desc: The \"American Pie\" gang returns to tie the knot. Jim hopes to have his wedding day go smoothly by enlisting the help of his friends, but the results are quite the opposite.

programme.title: Gigli
programme.desc: Love is a battlefield for a pair of bickering mob enforcers (Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez) whose head-to-head clashes lead to heart-to-heart chats while working for the same crime boss. A romantic comedy-caper film from director Martin Brest (\"Midnight Run\"). Al Pacino, Christopher Walken and Lainie Kazan have cameos. Justin Bartha, Lenny Venito.

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: Crisp dialogue and a zigzagging plot punctuate this taut caper flick. A veteran thief (Gene Hackman) is pressured into one last heist by a greedy gangster (Danny DeVito). But disloyalty and deadly double-crosses threaten to undo the operation when the gangster's hotheaded nephew joins the crew. Delroy Lindo, Sam Rockwell, Ricky Jay. Written and directed by David Mamet.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: A nail-biting thriller about a family that's targeted by a ruthless band of criminals, who kidnap the daughter and demand a ransom for her release.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Ten years after they joined forces to survive the zombie apocalypse, a makeshift and relatively dysfunctional family of seasoned zombie slayers travels to the American heartland to square off against other survivors and a variety of newly evolved zombies.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
